roleset.name: make volatile, convert into gas
roleset.note: VOLATILIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'volatilize' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VN. VerbNet entry 45.4, but usage seems to be strictly intransitive; comparison with 'ionize.' (from volatilize.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: instrument or manner, if separate from arg 0

example.name: Intransitive
example.text: It suggests little chlorine gas (Cl2) would have been emitted during dishwasher usage, since liquid chlorine will volatilize when it is in the form of HOCl
example.arg: when it is in the form of HOCl
